about_the_game:
WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

IMPORTANT: This game requires patience and attention to detail to solve all of the puzzles, stories, and achievements. The stories unfold through unique visualization with subtle environmental clues to offer players a unique narrative experience. Because of this, this game could be deemed a little difficult to the average player.

Be The Explorer : Assume the role of an urban explorer, whose curiosity leads you into destinations forgotten by time. Soon you discover the haunting mysteries you uncover are not left behind in the places you explore – they follow you home.

Beware Of Lingering Spirits : As you navigate the eerie forgotten spaces, each step unveils a cnarrative that ties you to the spectral entities lurking within. Uncover the connection that binds your existence to the restless spirits of the past. But beware, for every exploration comes at a cost, and the haunting entities you disturb won't rest until their stories are unraveled.

Solve Untold Stories : Immerse yourself in the thrill of unraveling mysteries, as you piece together the fragments of your haunted reality by rewatching the videos you've recorded in the past. Explore the depths of chilling narratives, solve cryptic puzzles, and decipher the ominous messages left behind by the entities determined to make their presence known.

Explore Desolate Urban Locations : As you explore abandoned spaces, restless spirits become entwined with your very essence. The haunting entities, manifest within the shadows and echoes of your daily life. No longer confined to the desolate landscapes you explore; they weave their spectral threads into the fabric of your reality.

Beware Of The Present : Every exploration is a descent into the unknown, where the line between reality and the supernatural blurs. Can you confront the shadows of the past and unveil their truth, or will you succumb to the haunting history that relentlessly pursue you? Brace yourself for an unforgettable adventure where the spirits of the past linger, and every rewatched moment may hold the key to your salvation or eternal haunting.

Features

  • 5 Unique Locations

  • Dynamic Events

  • Multi-Save Slots

  • Achievements

  • Progress Goals

  • Puzzles

  • Mystery Solving

Accessibility

  • Disable head bob to reduce motion sickness

  • Disable Global Illumination to run on lower end PCs

  • Controller support

  • Invert settings for both controller and mouse + keyboard

  • Full control of sound volume

name: Dismay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3080 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
